info.name: Custom AdFree Pages
info.description:
Few changes, for a few pages, for a few friends.

For YouTube, enable Cosmic Panda here: http://www.youtube.com/cosmicpanda www.youtube.com/cosmicpanda
info.additionalInfo:
<=== Update log ===>

2012.03.07 Youtube

2011.01.11 Some improvements on google and youtube

2011.12.29 Youtube, Cosmic Panda Classic

2011.11.12 Beta Cosmic Panda skin for youtube.

2011.04.19
Fixed another Sg.hu bug -.-

2011.05.14.
SG.hu -> Removed advertisement on the bottom.
omg-facts.com -> same

2011.04.12.
Fixed SG.hu bug (not showing youtube videos)
Added 2 new sites


<=== Sites ===>

Youtube.com
 Made for this userscript -> http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/13333
Fixed width to prevent the jumping of flash during loading. (use DEFAULT size in script)
Fixed colors for Vevo videos.


Omg-facts
 Remove advertisements and other unnecessary stuffs. Wider/more readable.


Izismile
 Works for both new and old design. Remove unnecessary divs, fixed width, more readable.


Heavy.com
 Remove Ads, etc etc...


Damnhot.net
 Just like Izismile





/* Hungarian Pages */

Ncore.cc
 Reklámokat tünteti el, és fixál pár dolgot.


Bithumen.be
 Fölös dolgokat tüntet el.


Bonusz Brigád
 Idegesítő popupoknak és a facebook hülyeségeknek annyi.


Sg.hu
 Reklám mentesítés, és picit gyakorlatiasabbá tettem, alulról fölös dolgok eltüntetve.


Techline
